name: MapRegionTypev2
summary: Simple object representing a map location and zoom level.

properties.name: bearing
properties.summary: The direction in which a vertical line on the map points, measured in degrees clockwise from north.
properties.description: For more details, see Google Docs. Cannot be used in conjunction with longitudeDelta or latitudeDelta

properties.name: latitude
properties.summary: Latitude value for the center point of the map, in decimal degrees.

properties.name: latitudeDelta
properties.summary: The amount of north-to-south distance displayed on the map, measured in decimal degrees.

properties.name: longitude
properties.summary: Longitude value for the center point of the map, in decimal degrees.

properties.name: longitudeDelta
properties.summary: The amount of east-to-west distance displayed on the map, measured in decimal degrees.

properties.name: tilt
properties.summary: The camera's position on an arc between directly over the map's center position and the surface of the Earth, measured in degrees from the nadir.
properties.description: For more details, see Google Docs. Cannot be used in conjunction with longitudeDelta or latitudeDelta

properties.name: zoomLevel
properties.description: For more details, see Google Docs. Cannot be used in conjunction with longitudeDelta or latitudeDelta
